Package controller

Class ViewController

java.lang.Object
controller.ViewController
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminView, BookingHistoryView, BookingView, CheckSeat, CreateMovieView, CreateShowView, DeleteMovieView, DeleteShowView, DisplayMovieView, HolidaySettingView, ListAllMovieView, MainView, MovieGoerView, MovieListView, MovieShowtimeView, PaymentView, PriceModifierView, ReviewView, SearchListMovieView, SearchMovieByNameView, ShowTimeView, SystemSettingView, Top5SettingView, Top5View, UpdateMovieView, UpdateShowView
public abstract class ViewController
extends java.lang.Object
This class is used to switch between different views

    void changeView​(ViewController prev, ViewController cur)
    This method is used to change from one View to another.

    This method deletes the current View by going back to the start of the last View.

    This method is to get the last View before this.
